title: How to disable and enable mobile data
answer:
The method to disable and enable mobile data: 

 Enable the mobile data in the drop-down notification bar: 

 Drop down the notification bar on the screen, click the data switch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110049) to enable mobile data, and then its status is highlighted ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110050). 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110051) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110052)
